text: The Thaw () is a 1931 Soviet drama movie directed by Boris Barnet.Человек, который не снял "Потемкина"Непрокатное кино. Афиша 29 ноября - 5 декабря It stars Vera Marinich, Aleksandr Zhukov, and Anton Martynov. == Actors == * Vera Marinich as Anka * Aleksandr Zhukov as Skulov * Anton Martynov as Semen * S. Pryanishnikov as Tarkhanov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1931 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Boris Barnet
title: The Thaw (1931 movie)
